EmailTemplate.subject: NCS - Information Evening
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCS powered by The Challenge
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
Invitation to your NCS Information Evening
Dear {!IF(Contact.Parent_Name__c <> ""," "& ( Contact.Parent_Name__c ) &" ","Parent or Guardian")},
{!Contact.FirstName}’s NCS programme is almost here!
I’m {!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_Mktg_lead_name__c}, your local NCS contact up until the NCS start date. I’d like to invite you and {!Contact.FirstName} to a short information evening. It’s a chance to find out more about NCS, ask questions, and meet others who have signed up.
Date: {!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_Date__c} Time: {!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_time__c} - it will last approximately one hour. Address: {!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_venue_and_address__c}
Please let me know if you’re coming by emailing me at {!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_SC_email_address__c} - or you can call or text me on {!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_Mktg_mobile_number__c}. Please include {!Contact.FirstName}’s name in your reply.
{!IF((Contact.Term_time_wave__c == TRUE),"","If you can’t make it but would still like to meet us, we’ll be holding other information evenings for NCS programmes running in different areas, or on different dates. Please contact me for details.
")} I look forward to seeing you at your information evening.
Yours sincerely,
{!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_Mktg_lead_name__c} The NCS Team - The Challenge
